workflow.name: Create a founder digest and leads from Hacker News with GPT-4o and Gmail
workflow.description:
![image 8.png](fileId:3894)
## üìä Description
 Automate daily founder intelligence from Hacker News without manual monitoring. This workflow scans Hacker News discussions (Show HN, launches, AI, startups, SaaS), filters out noise and non-discussion pages, and extracts only high-signal threads. AI then converts these discussions into a concise, founder-ready daily digest highlighting key trends, why they matter, and practical actions. The digest is delivered via email, while structured insights are logged to Google Sheets for long-term tracking and analysis. 
## ‚ö†Ô∏è Deployment Disclaimer
 This template is designed for self-hosted n8n installations only.
 It relies on external MCP tools and custom AI orchestration that are not supported on n8n Cloud.

## üîÑ What This Template Does
 1Ô∏è‚É£ Runs automatically on a daily schedule ‚è∞
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Searches Hacker News discussions via Google using SerpAPI üîç
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Extracts titles, summaries, links, and metadata from results üìÑ
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Filters out guidelines, index pages, and non-discussion links üö´
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Aggregates valid discussion threads into a single dataset üì¶
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Uses AI to identify key trends, problems, and founder-relevant signals üß†
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Generates a concise daily founder digest (trend, why it matters, actions) ‚úçÔ∏è
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Sends the digest automatically via email üìß
 9Ô∏è‚É£ Cleans and normalizes insights for storage üßπ
 üîü Appends structured founder intelligence to Google Sheets for tracking üìä
## ‚úÖ Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual Hacker News scanning
 ‚úÖ Surfaces only high-signal, founder-relevant discussions
 ‚úÖ Converts raw discussions into clear, actionable insights
 ‚úÖ Delivers a daily, skimmable founder digest automatically
 ‚úÖ Builds a historical intelligence log in Google Sheets
 ‚úÖ Creates a repeatable founder research workflow
## ‚öôÔ∏è Features
 - Daily scheduled execution
 - Hacker News discovery via Google Search (SerpAPI)
 - Noise filtering with custom JavaScript logic
 - AI-powered trend and insight extraction
 - Founder-focused digest generation
 - Email delivery via Gmail
 - Insight archiving in Google Sheets
## üîë Requirements
 - SerpAPI account
 - Azure OpenAI credentials
 - Gmail account connected to n8n
 - Google Sheets account
 - Self-hosted n8n instance
## üéØ Target Audience
 - Startup founders tracking early signals
 - Product and growth leaders monitoring trends
 - VCs and analysts scouting emerging tools
 - Teams needing automated market and founder intelligence

workflow.name: Automate Founder Digest & Lead Discovery from Hacker News with GPT-4o

parameters.content:
## üöÄ Automate Founder Digest & Lead Discovery from Hacker News (AI-Powered)

### How it works
This workflow automatically scans Hacker News on a daily schedule to identify high-signal discussions relevant to startup founders, builders, and early-stage teams. It focuses on Show HN, Launch HN, AI, SaaS, and startup-related threads and filters out low-value or guideline pages.

The workflow processes raw search results into structured discussion records and uses AI to generate two parallel outputs:
1. A concise daily Founder Digest emailed directly to you, summarizing key trends, why they matter, and recommended founder actions.
2. Qualified founder and buying-intent insights extracted from discussions, normalized, enriched with social context, and logged into Google Sheets for follow-up.

By combining SERP-based discovery, AI reasoning, and structured storage, this workflow turns Hacker News into a daily intelligence engine for founders, product teams, and growth operators.

### Setup steps
1. Connect SerpAPI for Hacker News discovery  
2. Configure Azure OpenAI credentials for AI analysis  
3. Set up Gmail OAuth2 for email delivery  
4. Connect Google Sheets OAuth2 for insight storage  
5. Add MCP credentials for social enrichment  
6. Review prompts and test before scheduling

## üì° Trigger & Search
Scheduled daily scan of Hacker News via Google SERP API. Searches for Show HN, Launch HN, AI, startup, and SaaS discussions to capture relevant founder conversations.

## üîç Data Processing
Extracts search results into structured records, filters out noise pages and guidelines, keeping only real discussion threads with actionable content.

## üìß Founder Digest
Generates a concise daily email digest highlighting key trends, why they matter, and actionable insights for founders. Uses AI to synthesize discussions into strategic intelligence.

## üéØ Lead Discovery
Analyzes discussions to identify buying-intent signals and qualify leads. Uses MCP client to enrich data from social platforms, then logs qualified leads to Google Sheets for follow-up.

## üîê Required Credentials
- SerpAPI for search
- Azure OpenAI for AI analysis
- Gmail OAuth2 for email delivery
- Google Sheets OAuth2 for data storage
- Xpoz MCP for social enrichment

Use OAuth2 where possible and never share personal API keys.

nodes.name: Search Hacker News Discussions via Google SERP

parameters.q: site:news.ycombinator.com ("Show HN" OR "Launch HN" OR "AI" OR "startup" OR "SaaS")

nodes.name: Extract SERP Results into Discussion Records
Filter Valid Hacker News Discussion Threads
Aggregate Hacker News Discussions for Analysis
Generate Founder Digest from Hacker News Discussions (AI)

parameters.text:
=You are given today's Hacker News discussions.

Create a concise daily founder digest using the data below.

Follow this format EXACTLY:

üî• Hacker News Daily Digest

üìå Key Trend
- One clear trend explained simply

üß† Why It Matters
- Business or product implication

üöÄ Founder Actions
- 2 practical actions founders can take

Hacker News Data:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.data, null, 2) }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a startup and technology trend analyst.
You specialize in extracting founder-relevant insights from Hacker News discussions.
Avoid fluff. Be concise and actionable.

nodes.name: LLM Reasoning Engine for Founder Digest
Email Founder Daily Hacker News Digest
Append Founder Insights to Hacker News Intelligence Sheet
Normalize AI Insight Output for Storage
LLM Engine for Lead Qualification & Signal Interpretation
External Social Context & Enrichment Tool (MCP Client)

parameters.text:
=You are given Hacker News discussion data.

TASK:
Analyze the data and extract relevant founder intelligence.

For the given discussions, identify:

1. Key Signal
- What important shift, problem, or opportunity is being discussed?

2. Problem Statement
- What concrete problem founders or developers are facing?

3. Why This Matters
- Business or product implication (cost, speed, competition, revenue, risk).

4. Actionable Insight
- One clear action a founder or product team should consider.

Use ONLY the provided data.
Do NOT invent facts.

Hacker News Data:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.data, null, 2) }}

options.systemMessage:
You are a founder intelligence analyst.

Your job is to analyze Hacker News discussion data and extract ONLY high-signal, actionable insights.

Focus on:
- Problems founders are complaining about
- Clear shifts in technology, tools, or business models
- Signals that indicate buying intent, adoption, or disruption

Ignore:
- Generic opinions
- News headlines without discussion value
- Vague commentary without consequences

Think like:
- A startup founder
- A product strategist
- An early-stage investor

Be precise. Do not add fluff.

parameters.content:
## üì¶ Discussion Aggregation
Combines all valid Hacker News discussions into a single
dataset for downstream AI analysis.

‚Ä¢ Aggregates multiple threads  
‚Ä¢ Preserves discussion context  
‚Ä¢ Prepares data for AI reasoning

With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.
